title: Pixel 2XL Android Auto not connecting to my 2019 Hyundai Tucson.
content: Trying to connect my Pixel 2XL to my Adroid Auto  and Phone Projection in my 2019 Hyundai Tucson.  My Bluetooth connection works.  Android Auto and Phone Projection not detecting phone.  Tried basic troubleshooting and looked up articles state it should work.  Called support Hyundai Corporate sent me to third party site useless.  Dealership told me to bring car in.  Before I do that I want to see if anyone else has problem
